EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: See you Tomorrow for the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up tomorrow in London. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Tuesday, September 23, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided)
Pivotal Software Bentima House 168-172 Old Street London, EC1V 9BP
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans)
- The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
Morning Session The morning session of the workshop will require a FREE account on Pivotal Web Services. You can create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io <https://run.pivotal.io>.
Afternoon Session The afternoon session of the workshop will require the use of a FREE Cloudbees account. Create one at https://grandcentral.cloudbees.com <https://grandcentral.cloudbees.com>. Once you’re set up, click on "Get Started with Builds" to provision your Jenkins instance. We’ll complete the remainder of the setup during the lab, but it’s important to get the Jenkins instance provisioned in advance so that you don’t lose 10 minutes of workshop time!
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
